org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors
Class HeartbeatRequest

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors.HeartbeatRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.cougaar.core.util.UniqueObject
public class HeartbeatRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.cougaar.core.util.UniqueObject

A Plugin developer requests a Heartbeat by publishing a HeartbeatRequest on the blackboard of a local agent with HeartbeatRequesterPlugin loaded.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int ACCEPTED
          A HeartbeatRequest which has been accepted by target agent.
static int FAILED
          A HeartbeatRequest which had not been accepted/denied before timing out or failing in some other way.
static int NEW
          A new HeartbeatRequest that has not yet resulted in a request being sent to target agent.
static int REFUSED
          A HeartbeatRequest which has been denied by target agent.
static int SENT
          A HeartbeatRequest that has resulted in a request being sent to target agent.

Constructor Detail

HeartbeatRequest

public HeartbeatRequest(org.cougaar.core.util.UID uid,
                        org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress source,
                        org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress target,
                        long reqTimeout,
                        long hbFrequency,
                        long hbTimeout)
Parameters:
uid - UID of this request
source - MessageAddress of agent requesting the Heartbeat
target - MessageAddress of agent providing the Heartbeat
reqTimeout - Request timeout in milliseconds
hbFrequency - Heartbeat frequency in milliseconds
hbTimeout - Heartbeat timeout in milliseconds
